name: Advance
description:
IT'S FIRE!

RUN!

@-------------------------------@

"Advance" is a short 2D auto-scrolling platformer about being overwhelmed by the first technologic discovery.

Music progresses with you.

Catapults are not safe.

I warned you.

@-------------------------------@

Controls:

'Up' to jump.

'Left' and 'Right' to slightly strafe .

'R' to restart.

'Escape' to exit

@-------------------------------@

At the moment, only for Windows. I hope I can manage to port it to Linux.
